CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Blend of bass punch and bass level – balance thump with body
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Bass power curve – higher values make kicks sharper and more distinct
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_pow

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Bass threshold – sets the floor and ceiling for bass response
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_limit

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Bass hit intensity – how strongly beats spin the visuals
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_level_0

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Bass rotation falloff – how quickly spin slows down after a hit
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_falloff_0

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Bass rotation speed – steady motion plus an extra push on hits
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_speed_0

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Mid hit intensity – how much mids shake things up
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_level_1

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Mid rotation falloff – spin fade for the mids
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_falloff_1

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Mid rotation speed – baseline motion plus boost on hits
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_speed_1

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: High hit intensity – highs and upper mids giving extra push
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_level_2

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: High rotation falloff – how quickly high-driven spin fades
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_falloff_2

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: High rotation speed – from subtle shimmer to wild whirl
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_speed_2

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Fractal distance and modulation – stretch or compress the galaxy
CONTROLS.NAME: shape_xy

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Flash color – pick your strobe vibe
CONTROLS.NAME: flash_col

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Flash intensity – from gentle pulse to full blast
CONTROLS.NAME: flash_xy

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Global brightness – set the overall glow
CONTROLS.NAME: global_div

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Fractal base color (XY) – your main palette
CONTROLS.NAME: base_xy

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Fractal base color (ZW) – extra palette controls
CONTROLS.NAME: base_zw

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Fractal saturation and offset – vivid neon or soft pastel
CONTROLS.NAME: base_mod

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Feedback strength – how much the past lingers (off-beat vs. beat)
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_strength

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Feedback zoom – past frame scaling (off-beat vs. beat)
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_zoom

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Feedback rotation – ghost spin added to the current frame
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_rot

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Feedback tint for off-beat moments
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_min

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Feedback tint for on-beat highlights
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_max

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Media opacity – fade visuals in or out
CONTROLS.NAME: media_opacity

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Media multiplier – boost opacity for bold color effects
CONTROLS.NAME: media_multiplier

DESCRIPTION: Kali galaxy – kali fractal visuals that dance with the beat.
TITLE: Kali galaxy
